sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>This fix script will enable all the entitlement associated to com.sn_hr_core in the ua_entitlement table </description> <name>Enable COE based on Entitlements - CORE</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[try{ gs.info("Fix Script: Enable COE based on Entitlements - CORE: started"); new sn_hr_core.hr_Utils().enableAllEntitlements('com.sn_hr_core'); gs.info("Fix Script: Enable COE based on Entitlements - CORE: completed"); } catch (e) { gs.info("Fix Script: Enable COE based on Entitlements - CORE: exception: " + e); }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-01-18 19:01:09</sys_created_on> <sys_id>8c948c1b5f103200502f4ae04f4666bc</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Enable COE based on Entitlements - CORE</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Human Resources: Core" source="sn_hr_core">d4ac3fff5b311200a4656ede91f91af2</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Human Resources: Core">d4ac3fff5b311200a4656ede91f91af2</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_8c948c1b5f103200502f4ae04f4666bc</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-09-07 20:37:31</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Enable COE based on Entitlements - CORE
